alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 7:56AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 830 AM EST... At 755 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from Ortega to near Florahome. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, Baymeadows, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace, Switzerland, Nas Jax and Doctors Inlet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Duval
